divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching TV on my living room couch when I something caught my eye. I turned my attention out my window and saw a glowing orange sphere of light hovering above the tree-line. The light had lit up my kitchen which was directly behind the living room where I was laying, and even my cat had witnessed the light from the window. As I observed it further I saw it slowly move along the tree tops to the right and then disappear.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Midland
There were no other sightings in Midland on or around May 31st 2012
Summary: Bright orange sphere appeared out living room window, then took off.
